title: Documentation doesn't include when features were added.
body: It's common in many standard libraries to include when some API was added, usually in italics, such as _Added in Go 1.6_. It would be very useful to include this going forward with Go documentation. Some examples I've run into include package "context", and reflect.StructOf being Go 1.7, and sync.Pool not being present in Go 1, etc.
